As we progress towards upgrading this site and in my quest to have a huge suite of services available for lurkers and users, I've set up a new photo gallery site.  It's been beta tested and as far as I can tell, everything is running smoothly.  You can see it at:  http://www.ontariofishing.ca/media  So if you want a storage place for your fishing pictures, now we have one!  (unlimited storage at this point.)  Now for the contest!!   To enter, all ya have to do is register at the site (to make thing easy use your same user id as here if you want), and at the end of March Ill pick 5 users at random and the winners will get an OFC Hat, T-shirt and any other swag I can dig up.  So drop by and register and upload a few photos!!  http://www.ontariofishing.ca/media  Thanks for everyone's help with beta testing as well...  The nice thing about this site is its easy to find the link you need when posting pictures here!!
Great job TJ!  Registered, now I have to find some fish that aren't camera shy, LOL!
Just registered!
